eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.core

Interface PoolManager<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the object type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmailPoolManager, FTPPoolManager, JDBCPoolManager, JMSPoolManager, LocalPoolManager, SOAPPoolManager, WebPoolManager

    public interface PoolManager<T>
    The pool manager interface for creating, verifying and closing objects.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011-10-05

    • Method Summary
